DESCRIPTION: Sigils are normally unplayable cards which are played when they are discarded from your hand.
Activated relics do not have a passive effect. They have an effect when their button is clicked.
Cards with an activate effect let you trigger that effect when you wish. They have a clickable button to the left of the energy orb.
Orb: Deals damage whenever you attack an enemy. When evoked deals damage to a random target.
Orb: Deals damage to a random enemy at the start of your turn. When evoked, deal damage to a random enemy.
Corroded creatures take more damage from everything.
Gain Block at the end of your turn.
Resonant cards have their damage boosted by the enemy's Ringing.
If a creature has frostbite equal to at least 20% of its current HP, it becomes slow.
Whenever a Jinxed creature receives another debuff, it loses HP.
Whenever you play a card, slowed creatures receive 10% more damage from attacks that turn.
Constricted creatures take damage at the end of their turns.
